entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
